---
title: "SPP for APX"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
APX <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/APX.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
apx <- ts(APX[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+198/365.25)
apx %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(apx))
```

```{r}
training_apx <- subset(apx, end=length(apx)-1)
test_apx <- subset(apx, start=length(apx)-1)
fc_training_apx<-forecast(training_apx)
fc_training_apx %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_apx)
```

```{r}
fc_training_apx
```

```{r}
fc_apx<-forecast(apx)
fc_apx %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_apx
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_apx)
```
